text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump Blonde hair & a pretty face carries one far under this ridiculous administration of the imbecilic orange greed goblin

We need more. We need education, compassion & integrity

You are a cheap, malfunctioning stepford wife
#GOPDeathPanels #GOPCorruptionOverCountry #COVID19 https://t.co/JpY134tMR3
